events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. Thank you for your interest.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further processing and review.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to manage your application moving forward.
The initial screening of your application and resume has been completed successfully, and you meet the key criteria.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming availability for the next step in the interview process.
Your technical interview has been scheduled with our senior software engineer for May 16th at 11:00 AM UTC.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving and coding skills.
Your HR interview is scheduled for May 20th at 3:00 PM UTC. This will cover company culture and role expectations.
